name: water-sport
effect: fire moves inflict half damage, regardless of target.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
The user becomes soaked to
raise resistance to fire.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
The user becomes soaked to
raise resistance to fire.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Weakens FIRE-type
attacks while the
user is in the
battle.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:

with water. The move
weakens Fire-type
moves while the user
is in the battle.

It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
